explanation: The if-condition line was wrong in two ways: it compared P[i] to itself (P[i] >= P[i]) instead of comparing product i's price to product j's price, and it tested the wrong set difference (F[i] - F[j]) which checks if i has extra functions instead of checking if j has extra functions. I fixed that line to use P[i] >= P[j] and (F[j] - F[i]) so it correctly checks j is a superset of i and whether j strictly contains extra functions (this follows the intended operator-direction fixes seen in the diffs).
